title: Lead Mode
description:
Swagu and Perk explain why Ja Morant is the #1 draw in the NBA, why Perk is rooting for James Harden and thinks Philly will win the title, and why LeBron's actions were troubling over the weekend. Plus, Swagu's thoughts on intermittent fasting. Let's get it!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
